sources.title: The Wild Party (1956) Anthony Quinn, Carol Ohmart, Arthur Franz, Jay Robinson, Kathryn Grant, Nehemiah Persoff, Paul Stewart.
sources.description: The Wild Party is a 1956 American FILM NOlR crime film directed by Harry Horner and written by John McPartland. The film stars Anthony Quinn, Carol Ohmart, Arthur Franz, Jay Robinson, Kathryn Grant, Nehemiah Persoff, and Paul Stewart.

metadata.Plot: A night of terror in a sleazy nightspot, when an over-the-hill football star holds a thrill-seeking couple captive.
metadata.Actors: Anthony Quinn, Carol Ohmart, Arthur Franz
